value.title: DAX Fridays! #93: MAXX | Fill down with DAX and Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to fill down columns with DAX and also with Power Query.  Enjoy!  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Link to DAX Fridays survey: http://bit.ly/2MMM4KK    Looking for a download file? value.title: DAX Fridays! #94: Fill down with DAX (part 2)
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you what happens when you use FILTER with ALL  and without.  The example used is from the previous DAX Fridays! 93 where I show you how to do a fill down in DAX: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQIDJVkFW8o  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU

value.title: DAX Fridays! #97: STANDARD DEVIATION EXPLAINED | Who is the best player, LeBron or Durant?
value.excerpt: Who is the best player, Duran or LeBron? Let's find out using statistics and standard deviation.  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Download file here: https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/stdev-s-dax  More on STATISTCAL DAX FUNCTIONS here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDz00l_jz6zxc8iinR39euGqFm4SDabBf

value.title: DAX Fridays! #98: NORM.DIST | Predicting Kevin Durant Scores
value.excerpt: What is the probability that Kevin Durant will score 36 PTS in the next match?  In today's DAX Fridays! We continue the Statistic Functions series with the function NORM.DIST.  Download file here: https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/norm-dist-dax-functions  More on STATISTCAL DAX FUNCTIONS here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDz00l_jz6zxc8iinR39euGqFm4SDabBf

value.title: DAX Fridays! #99: NORM.INV |  Predicting Kevin Durant top scores
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! We continue the Statistic Functions series with the function NORM.INV. value.title: After Union Two tables, data goes to the wrong column with Power BI DAX?
